data.title: Microsoft: If I Could Own Just One Stock

data.title: Even After Strong Year, Microsoft Stock Remains a Buy-And-Forget Stock
data.text: Long-term rally in MSFT stock is likely to pick up steam in the coming weeks ahead of earnings and elections. The post Even After Strong Year, Microsoft Stock Remains a Buy-And-Forget Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.
